仕留める.english: to kill, to shoot, to bring down
examples: 必ず仕留めるぞ
Definitely kill it!

伸びる.english: stretch or extend, postpone, make progress or improve, be exhausted, be straightened or smoothed out
examples: このゴムはよく伸びる
This rubber stretches well [is very elastic].
英語の力が大いに伸びたね
You have made great progress with your English.
頭に{一撃}{いちげき}をくらって彼は伸びてしまった
He passed out from one blow to the head
髪が伸びていない
You're hair isn't straightened/smoothed out.

寝ぼける.english: to be half-asleep and talk nonsense
examples: そんなに寝ぼけるまで{熟睡}{じゅくすい}してたの？
Was it such a deep sleep that you speak nonsense?
そんなに寝ぼけるまで熟睡してたの？
Was it such a deep sleep that you speak nonsense?
一度おじさんに診てもらったら
What about asking Ojisan?

やがて.english: almost, soon, presently, in a short while
examples: やがて君はそのことを後悔するでしょう
You'll be sorry for that soon.
やがて腹が減り喉も渇く
It doesn't take long for our bellies to become empty and our throats to become dry.
